name: Ihsan Faridi
summary: Full Stack Developer specializing in AI-Powered & Frontend-First Applications | Turning Ideas into Scalable Products. Experienced in building modern web applications using React.js, Next.js, Node.js, Python, and AI technologies. Passionate about creating scalable solutions and mentoring developers.

experience.title: Full-stack Developer
experience.summary: Developed full-stack applications with AI integration, focusing on frontend-first architecture and scalable solutions. Worked remotely from Brisbane, Australia, leveraging modern technologies to build innovative products.
highlights: Built AI-powered applications using Next.js and TypeScript for frontend development
Developed backend services with Node.js and Python for scalable architecture
Integrated AI technologies including ChatGPT and Cursor AI into applications
Managed version control and collaboration using GitHub
Worked remotely, delivering high-quality solutions across time zones

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
experience.summary: Led web development projects as a self-employed senior developer, specializing in React.js, Next.js, and Python-based backend solutions. Built AI-integrated applications using FastAPI and modern frontend frameworks.
highlights: Developed modern web applications using React.js and Next.js
Built RESTful APIs and backend services using Python and FastAPI
Integrated AI capabilities into web applications

experience.title: Web Developer
experience.summary: Mentored students in web development fundamentals, teaching HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React.js. Provided one-on-one guidance on industry-standard tools and best practices, fostering strong foundations in web design and development.
highlights: Conducted one-on-one mentoring sessions teaching HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React.js
Provided guidance on industry-standard tools including GitHub, Visual Studio Code, Figma, and Firebase hosting
Fostered strong foundation in web design, emphasizing best practices
Inspired creativity and problem-solving skills in students
Developed comprehensive curriculum and learning materials
